abstract: Fusion Electronics has created an AM-FM car stereo, the CA-IP500, that also is an internal dock for your iPod.
snippet: Fusion Electronics has created an AM-FM car stereo, the CA-IP500, that also is an internal dock for your iPod.
lead_paragraph: Pre-iPod, drivers who wanted to listen to music had little alternative to turning on their radio or manually inserting compact discs (or cassette tapes) into a player. After Apple’s music player arrived, drivers who wanted to ditch those options for the iPod largely had to be content with an external iPod setup, complete with cords, brackets and other unwieldy arrangements.

headline.main: Forget the Cigarette Lighter Adapter. Now You Can Dock Your iPod in the Car Radio.
headline.print_headline: Forget the Cigarette Lighter Adapter. Now You Can Dock Your iPod in the Car Radio.
